data.title: Extended family tree for family of Fred W. Phelps Sr.
data.meta_description: Editor’s note: This is an extended family tree for the Fred Phelps Sr. family, to the best of our knowledge at this time. Some of the grandchildren’s ages and their status in the church may not be up…
data.text:
Editor’s note: This is an extended family tree for the Fred Phelps Sr. family, to the best of our knowledge at this time. Some of the grandchildren’s ages and their status in the church may not be up to date.

PARENTS

Fred Waldron Phelps Sr., born Nov. 13, 1929, died March 19, 2014

Married on May 15, 1952: Margerie “Margie” M. Simms, born Sept. 15, 1925

CHILDREN:

1. Rachel I. Phelps-Hockenbarger, born Aug. 27, 1965

Married: Charles F. Hockenbarger, born 1974

Their children:

Three or four children who may be minors

2. Shirley Lynn Phelps-Roper, born Oct. 31, 1957

Married: Brent D. Roper, born April 6, 1963

Their children:

Samuel Phelps-Roper, married Jennifer Lynn Hockenbarger

Isaiah Phelps-Roper

Rebekah “Bekah” Phelps-Roper

Zacharias Phelps-Roper, left the church

Four children who may be minors

Joshua F. Phelps-Roper, left the church

Megan Phelps-Roper, left the church

Grace Phelps-Roper, left the church

3. Jonathan Baxter Phelps, born Nov. 20, 1959

Married: Paulette Phelps Osslander, born Jan. 28, 1960 or 1961

Their children:

Jael Phelps, married Matthias Holroyd

Joshua M. Phelps

Jacob M. Phelps

Joseph M. Phelps

4. Timothy Bryan Phelps, born Aug. 10, 1963

Married: Lee Ann Phelps-Brown, born July 28, 1966

Their children:

Four or five children who may be minors

Timothy Phelps Jr.

Victoria L. Phelps

Hezekiah Job Phelps, left the church

Benaiah Phelps

5. Rebekah Phelps-Davis, born Feb. 19, 1961

Married: Chris Davis, born Nov. 20, 1955 (may have left church)

Their children:

Micaiah Phelps-Davis

Lydia Phelps-Davis

Two children who may be minors

6. Fred Waldron Phelps Jr., born May 4, 1953

Married: Betty Joan Schurle-Phelps, born Jan. 12, 1952 or 1953

Their children:

Sara Phelps (may have left)

Benjamin C. Phelps, married Mara Jones Phelps

Elizabeth “Libby” Phelps Alvarez, left the church

Sharon Phelps, left the church

7. Abigail R. Phelps, born Aug. 27, 1968

8. Margie Jean Phelps, born July 16, 1956

Children:

Jacob Z. Phelps, adopted son (may have left)

9. Elizabeth Marie Phelps, born July 2, 1962

10. Nathan “Nate” Randall Phelps, born Nov. 22, 1958, left the church

11. Katherine Phelps-Griffin, born June 1, 1955, left the church

12. Mark Wade Phelps, born June 25, 1954, left the church

13. Dortha Phelps, left church and changed name to Dortha Olive Bird, born Oct. 29, 1964

Possible successor:

Stephen Drain

Married Luci Renee Drain

Their children:

Lauren Drain, left church

Taylor Drain, engaged to George Stutzman

Source: Phelps family, court records, attorney documents and online reports
